title: C1003 - Control Module Internal Power Malfunction

body.body: C1003 - Control Module Internal Power Malfunction
C1003 - Control Module Internal Power Malfunction - Fault - CM8; CR8; CS8; PB1; PJ1; PJZ; PM1; PR1; PRB; PRC; PS1; PSB; PSC; PWC; PX1; PXB; PXC; PY1; PYB; PYC
Chassis ECM internal power supply malfunction
If DTC C1002 is also present, rectify DTC C1002 (see
C1001, C1002 - Power Supply Rail Overvoltage/Undervoltage
) then erase DTCs. Monitor for further instances.
If C1002 is not present, check and record all other DTCs and contact Triumph service.
